data.title: Bruce Sterling – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Bruce Sterling. Browse Bruce Sterling’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
Ascendancies

The Best of Bruce Sterling

By: Bruce Sterling

Narrated by: Pavi Proczko, Brian Nishii, Mikael Naramore, and others

Length: 26 hrs and 39 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 6

Performance

4.5 out of 5 stars 5

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 5

Two dozen tales of future shock and twisted history from an undisputed king of cyberpunk science fiction, including Nebula Award finalists “Sunken Garden” and “Dori Bangs”....

Heavy Weather

By: Bruce Sterling

Narrated by: Gary Tiedemann

Length: 11 hrs and 18 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4 out of 5 stars 18

Performance

5 out of 5 stars 13

Story

4 out of 5 stars 13

The Storm Troupers are a group of weather hackers who roam the plains of Texas and Oklahoma, hopped up on adrenaline and technology. Utilizing virtual reality, flying robots, and all-terrain vehicles, they collect data on the extreme storms ravaging an America decimated by climate change....

5 out of 5 stars

Entertaining and thought provoking.

By William on 06-12-21

Unabridged

4 out of 5 stars 17

In the late twenty-first century, technology has lengthened lifespans far beyond what was once medically possible. Existence itself has become relatively easy - if boring....

5 out of 5 stars

Prescient

Bruce Sterling delves into the world of high-tech crime and punishment in one of the first books to explore the cyberspace breaches that threaten national security....

5 out of 5 stars

Great bit of journalism chronicling a bygone era.

Two decades into the twenty-first century, the world’s nations are becoming irrelevant. Corporations are the true global powers, with information the most valuable currency, while the smaller island nations have become sanctuaries for data pirates and terrorists....
